All Implemented Interfaces:
org.omg.CORBA.portable.InvokeHandler, LocalFailureDetectorOperations
public class LocalFailureDetectorImpl
extends LocalFailureDetectorPOA

A class implementing the Local Failure Detector.

See the IRL idl documentation.

object_crashed

public void object_crashed(org.omg.CORBA.Object ior)
Manage the object crash. For all object (except IRLFactory):
  • remove info from log;
  • raises the fault report;
Parameters:
ior - The object crashed.

set_IRLFactory

public boolean set_IRLFactory(IRLFactory irl_factory)
Set the IRL Factory reference and start the monitoring for this LocalFailureDetector crash.
Parameters:
irl_factory - The reference of the IRLFactory of this host.
Returns:
true if the LocalFailureDetector monitoring starts without error, false otherwise.
